annotations.description: If you're not into yoga, if you have half a brain, get in here and lets make a perfect Piña Colada already, it's delicious. *********************************...
annotations.title: Gonna need two of these... | How to Drink

annotations.description: Happy NOT Piña Colada Day! Marius and I always miss the booze Holidays but does that stop us??? No it doesn't! Truth be told this isn't the original Piña Col...
annotations.title: Happy NOT Piña Colada Day!

textContent:
1oz (30ml) White Rum
1oz (30ml) Jamaica Rum
1.5oz (45ml) Pineapple Juice
.5oz (15ml) Coconut Cream
.25oz (7.5ml) Lime Juice
Angostura Bitters Garnish (optional)

Whip shake with crushed ice and open pour into collins glass
Top with crushed ice
Garnish with angostura

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dRpsz7UzGrA

---

16 oz. of Ice
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Creme of Coconut
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Pineapple Juice
8 oz. Fresh Pineapple Chunk
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Rum

Blend till frappe'd
Serve and garnish
Melt into a sunset.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bw2LOGPFuwU
title: Piña Colada
